positions.title: Staff Software Engineer
positions.description:
The leading food delivery company in Brazil, my focus is on planning and providing systems for iFood's developers.

My duties include:

- Building IDP (internal developer platform) systems, abstracting the complexity of release control using Kubernetes, helping internal developers during deployment and rollback. 
- Building systems responsible for deployment management using the canary deployment strategy with auto-promote, auto-abort and company guardrails, avoiding incidents;
- Helping other developers with design patterns, architecture, tests and delivery;
- Helping in the team management, scheduling events (such as task refinements, retrospectives, daily meetings, etc);
- Evaluating project needs, plan features, estimate deliveries and help with quality standard definitions;
- Building strong monitors to observe system usage, and helping with user experience improvements.

Main technologies:

- GoLang
- Java 21+, VirtualThreads, Spring Framework, Quarkus, Reactor
- PostgreSQL
- Docker
- Apache Kafka, SQS and SNS
- Kubernetes, Helm and Argo Rollouts
- CI/CD using GitLab CI and ArgoCD
- Datadog

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description:
Created from B2W Digital before merging with Lojas Americanas (one of the biggest retail sellers in Brazil), the company was responsible for digital wallets and portable and fixed POS (point of sale) systems.

My duties included:

- Providing new payment features on the fixed POS system, integrating new TEF (a payment system with a physical card) partners using their C library files with Node.js V8 engine, to control pinpad devices;
- Providing new server-side payment features with fail-safe architecture (asynchronous processes) using AWS services (Lambda, API Gateway, SNS, SQS, DynamoDB, CloudFormation);
- Architecting an update system for fixed POS using WebSocket (monitoring POS status in real-time), implementing a patch update system and a private P2P network to download updates from other POS machines at the same place;
- Helping other developers with design patterns, architecture, tests and delivery;
- Helping in the team management, scheduling events (such as task refinements, retrospectives, daily meetings, etc);
- Evaluating project necessities, planning features, delivery estimation, guardrails, user experience and usage monitoring.

Main technologies:

- Java 8+, Groovy, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, C++
- Spring Framework, Grails, AngularJS, Electron, Gradle
- WebSocket, P2P private network, MQTT
- Custom C++ modules for Node.js
- MongoDB e DynamoDB
- Docker
- API Gateway, Lambda, SNS, SQS, S3, ElastiCache, CloudFormation
- Bamboo and GitLab for CI/CD
